name: py-pyopengl

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
PyOpenGL is the most common cross platform Python binding to OpenGL and
related APIs.

dependencies.name: freeglut
dependencies.description:
FreeGLUT is a free-software/open-source alternative to the OpenGL
Utility Toolkit (GLUT) library

dependencies.description: Shim package for the OSMesa OpenGL library.

dependencies.description: Shim package for Apple implementation of OpenGL Utility Libray (GLU)

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
